summary: WHILE DRIVING IN INCLEMENT WEATHER AND  APPLYING THE BRAKES THEY  FAILED TO STOP  THE VEHICLE AND THE PEDAL WENT TO THE FLOOR.  CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO MAINTAIN CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE,  AND DROVE THE VEHICLE TO THE  DEALER FOR INSPECTION.  THE MECHANIC REPLACED THE BRAKES, BUT  PROBLEM RECURRED.  *AK
